channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+6303] Why I believe printers are the spawn of Hell - The Oatmeal
item.description: My latest comic. "Printers are remarkable in that they're just as crappy and unreliable now as they were in 1995. "

item.title: [+2838] Conan O’Brien Says He Won’t Do Tonight Show at 12:05
item.description: NBC's Conan O'Brien says he will not do "The Tonight Show" at 12:05 a.m. "I cannot express in words how much I enjoy hosting this program and what an enormous personal disappointment it is for me to consider losing it."

item.title: [+2711] Airport Security Fail (PIC)
item.description: Put a computer in front of someone and they'll use it to not do their job.

item.title: [+2407] Why is the Xbox 360 called the Xbox 360?
[+2285] The Internet [PIC]
item.description: I could finish my research paper, or...

item.title: [+2216] Why We're on Team Conan O'Brien
item.description: Conan O'Brien's 2010 is starting off like a kick to the crotch. The brilliant and good-natured comedian who last year moved everything -- his family, his staff -- to Los Angeles to take over Jay Leno's reign of the 'Tonight Show' is now sitting in late-night limbo.

item.title: [+1709] What boyfriends and girlfriends search for on Google [PIC]
[+1330] ‘Strongest Man in the World’ dies at 104
item.description: Joe Rollino, a famed strongman who once lifted 3,200 pounds at Coney Island during its heyday and was still bending quarters with his fingers at age 104 died Monday after he was hit by a minivan.

item.title: [+1306] 'Remove Mail-Order Bride Posting Immediately' (Pic)
[+1135] Facebook Records Every Click You Make
item.description: And uses the data to decide who your "best" friends are. This is an anonymous interview with a Facebook employee who dishes on all the secrets of the 220 million person social network.

item.title: [+950] Where Is America's Debt? (PIC)
item.description: A look at the countries who hold the bulk of US national debt.

item.title: [+830] Megan Fox Strips Down for Armani (PICS)
item.description: If you thought Megan Fox was sexy on screen, just wait until you see these pics of her in her underwear for Emporio Armani!! The sizzling siren replaces last year’s Emporio Armani face and body, Victoria Beckham, while her hubby, David Beckham is replaced by soccer superstar Cristiano Ronaldo in the latest campaign.

item.title: [+820] Breaking! Republicans Re-Discover Racism!
item.description: In between demanding to see President Obama's birth certificate so that he can prove for once and for all that he is NOT a secret Kenyan Muslim and Republican demands to be able to racially profile all Muslim-Americans who might be mistaken for a terrorist based on appearance, name or faith, the Republican party has re-discovered racism in America.

item.title: [+778] I'm With Coco!
item.description: Apparently NBC doesn't read "the internet" or "the twitterz." Otherwise they would know that we all do in fact love Coco. Viva la revolucion!

item.title: [+736] "I Am The Hero That Gotham Deserves!"
item.description: You bet your ass you are.

item.title: [+720] California Pot Legalization Bill Up For Vote
item.description: In a move proponents are billing the "first formal consideration of marijuana legalization in American history," the public safety committee of the state assembly will today vote on Tom Ammiano's ganja bill.

item.title: [+654] Essential Whisky Facts Every Guy Should Know
item.description: All too often these days, we can't even identify what we´re drinking. If, Swingers style, you're going to order "any Glen" to impress the ladies, it's probably best if you don't mix it up with the bourbon your buddy ordered. So, with that noble goal in mind, here is your Whisky Cheat Sheet:

item.title: [+634] 30,000 BC (COMIC)
item.description: Proof that the Darwin Effect doesn't discriminate.

item.title: [+620] PhD Student Uses Math Equation to Explain Lack of Girlfriend
item.description: London resident adapts Drake Equation -- normally used to estimate number of evolved civilizations in galaxy -- to analyze his dating possibilities and challenges. Conclusion: in London he had a 0.0000034 percent chance of finding the "right" partner...

item.title: [+607] What Her Sex Excuse Really Means
item.description: If you're anything like us, you've raked in a lot of experience almost having sex over the years, and there's a good chance that you've heard almost every sex excuse in the book. But have you ever thought about what all those sex excuses really mean? Well, we have
